name: 吳景龍
objective:
本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
This course is aimed to facilitate students’ varied levels of English through an exposure of a variety of reading passages related to present day lives. The reading skills will be complemented by an integration of listening, reading and speaking activities.

Week 12: Lesson 8B

Week 14: Lesson 9A
Week 15: Lesson 9B

Week 18: Final Exam or Report.
scorePolicy:
Percentile of final grades 成績配分:
1. Midterm exam:  20 %
2. Final exam or report: 20%
3. Attendance: 20%
4. Assignmnets and participation in the classroom discussions: 20 % (Note: five absences leading to failure)
5. English proficiency test: 20%
